title: Apple IPhone 11
description: A powerful smartphone from Apple that combines an advanced processor, a large display, and an impressive camera. The iPhone 11 delivers an unparalleled user experience thanks to its stylish design, high performance, and innovative technologies.

title: Google Pixel 4
description: A next-generation smartphone from Google that offers advanced artificial intelligence features and a powerful camera. The Google Pixel 4 impresses not only with its stylish design but also with its ability to automatically adapt to the user's needs, providing a personalized experience.

title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: Samsung's flagship smartphone that combines elegant design with powerful specifications. The Galaxy S21 Ultra is equipped with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a high resolution of 3200x1440 pixels, providing incredible brightness and clarity.

title: Headphones
description: High-quality over-ear headphones with noise cancellation.

title: Microphone
description: Professional condenser microphone for studio recording.

title: Keyboard
description: A modern keyboard that offers convenience in data entry and quick access to essential functions. Ideal for work, study, and entertainment, this keyboard combines a stylish design with high performance.
